name: AnimationEvents
desc: Notable milestones that the framework signals during animation playback.

items.name: struct AnimationEvents.PlaybackCompleted
items.desc: The event raised when an animation reaches the end of its duration.

items.name: struct AnimationEvents.PlaybackLooped
items.desc: The event raised when an animation loops.

items.name: struct AnimationEvents.PlaybackTerminated
items.desc: The event raised when an event has been terminated, regardless of whether it ran to completion.
